se2xb3.data.processing

Class TweetProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • se2xb3.data.processing.TweetProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IProcessor<java.lang.String>

    public class TweetProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
implements IProcessor<java.lang.String>
    A class to process JSON encoded tweets.
    Since:
    3/11/2017

      • TweetProcessor

        public TweetProcessor()

    • Method Detail

      • process

        public java.lang.Object process(java.lang.String tweetStr)
        Process a string containing a JSON encoded string. The string is deserialized and the data is stored in a new instance of a Tweet.
        Specified by:
        process in interface IProcessor<java.lang.String>
        Parameters:
        tweetStr - a JSON encoded string containing a tweet
        Returns:
        a Tweet object containing the data from the JSON string

      • deserializeTweet

        public Tweet deserializeTweet(java.lang.String tweetStr)
        Deserialize tweet stored in a JSON encoded string. Then, return a new instance of a Tweet containing the twee data.
        Parameters:
        tweetStr - a JSON encoded string containing a tweet
        Returns:
        a Tweet object containing the data from the JSON string

      • processTweetText

        public void processTweetText(Tweet tweet)
        Process the text of each tweet as they are received. The words are extracted from the string using regular expressions and then inserted into the word graph.
        Parameters:
        tweet - a tweet

      • graphWord

        public void graphWord(java.lang.String word,
                      Tweet tweet)
        This is building a graph of words and tweets. One tweet is connected to many word nodes.
        Parameters:
        word - a word to add to the graph
        tweet - the tweet that uses the word

      • getAllMentions

        public WordNode[] getAllMentions()
        Get array of all mentions as an array of word nodes
        Returns:
        an array of all of the word nodes

      • getHashtags

        public WordNode[] getHashtags()
        Get array of hashtag mentions as an array of word nodes
        Returns:
        an array of all words that start with a #

      • getUsers

        public WordNode[] getUsers()
        Get array of user mentions as an array of word nodes
        Returns:
        all words that start with a @
